description.en:
THE FIRST METAVERSE
FOR FASHION INDUSTRY
NEW DIMENSION
Our desire is to create outstanding experience of trying on virtual clothes in the Metaverse. We are convinced that Metaverse and VR technology is the key to realising this vision.
FASHION EXPERIENCE
Thanks to the metaverse and 3D avatars, we take the shopping experience into a completely new dimension.
Trying on, sharing outfits and buying clothes in the metaverse will be so unbelievably exciting that you will never want to do it in other way.
